features: 【Wide Compatibility】 Size matching, suitable for Bissell Powerfresh Steam Mop 1940, 1540, 1440, 1806, 2075 series, models such as 19402, 19404, 19408, 19409, 1940A, 1940F, 1940Q, 1940T, 1940W, 1544, 15441, 15443, 15446, 15448, 1544A, 1544B, 1806, 2075A, B0006, B0017 etc.

【Affordable Set】This adaptation set includes 3 mop pads for daily cleaning and 3 mop pads with scrubbing stripes, all using microfibers, made of 80% polyester fiber and 20% polyamide fiber to ensure the cleaning effect. Combining flexibility and abrasion resistance to better remove stains and clean the floor, our life will be more favorable and more convenient!

【Washable&Reusable】The product can be machine washed or hand washed, and it’s quick-drying. We use high-quality materials, workmanship is excellent, the product does not take off the thread, fluff and fade after repeated washing.

【Effective Cleaning】The mop pad material has good water absorption and the product is easy to install. It can be used to clean wooden floors, tile surfaces, marble slabs, etc. The mop pad will remove dust, wipe off stains, take away dander, hair and other dirt, making the cleaning work more efficient!
【100% Satisfaction】 Mochenli will spare no efforts to provide you with better products and services. Please contact us in time for any product problems and suggestions, thank you very much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: These pads are a great value for the money. They fit my steam mop, but are a little tight (which can make getting them off and on a bit of a struggle). Adding a pull tab at one of the corners would help this, so I may see one on to test that. They work as expected and have yet to show signs of wear after weekly use for almost 4 months. Definitely make sure they are air dried (as with all steam mop pads) so they don't shrink. I will definitely repurchase when needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality with no issue!
reviews.reviewText: Pads work as described and fit the machine perfectly. Same durability as the original.I would buy it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money!
reviews.reviewText: Those are great value for the money. We had to look for news ones due to the ones that came starts to tear after couple months of usage (we use the steam mop once a week at least). So far the replacement ones works well and does start to show signs of usage, which is about the same durability as the original.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They’re good quality with no issues, but…
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and convenient, would’ve been great if I’d actually gotten to use them. Unfortunately for me, right after I bought them and only used one, my Bissell steam mop quit working. Only used it 4x, now it won’t even turn on. Don’t buy Bissell, buy something that will actually work for more than a few uses. Now that I’ve searched more reviews online, I realize the mop is just an overpriced piece of junk. Extremely disappointing, since I was really liked it the few times I got to use it. Of course companies don’t stand behind their products anymore and they won’t fix or replace it, so I’m out $$ for a steam mop and replacement pads I’ll never get to use… since I’m certainly not going to waste even more money for a new one I’m sure will also quit working. Too bad you can’t get replies on reviews, I’d love to send these perfectly good unused pads to someone who can actually use them. No problem with this product, it’s just the steam mop they’re made for is a piece of junk. :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a new Bissell Powerfresh Slim Stream Mop and wanted extra mop heads to use with it as it only comes with two.This pack provided 6, 3 of each kind (white and white with grey Chevron heavy duty).The pads fit perfectly, same as original. They performed great and I didn't notice any difference between these and OEM vs. the"Bissell" tag that came on the originals.Definitely an economical choice to replace or expand your mop heads if you're in the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cheaper than being them from any other place fits my Bissell Power Fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For great-work great
reviews.reviewText: Replaces the originals beautifully. I like the ones with the grippy swirls the best. These are thick and long lasting. A must if you have a steam mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These mop covers really clean our tile floors. The spots were all gone after using them
